txt.en: Meat can be found on some large game in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should collect meats.
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the meats in a storage crate.
Place the meats in a storage crate
Someone has posted a task to hunt for meats in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Meats from the Wildwood for eating and trading. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
